settings.question: Will I receive samples with my order?

settings.heading: Will I receive samples with my order?
settings.row_content: We are pleased to offer our customers complimentary sample bundles with all online orders

settings.heading: What is your refund/exchange policy?
settings.row_content:
Online purchases may be returned or exchanged in-store or via home pick-up within 30 days. Refund or Exchange will only be granted upon presentation of the original receipt. Items must be in original packaging and sellable condition. Exchange will be granted within 30 days from the date of purchase.

For in-store returns or exchanges of online purchases, please present the original invoice to a member of staff. Card transactions will be refunded to the card used for payment and not in cash. We regret, we can only process exchanges or refunds for purchases for direct purchases and not from any other supplier. Products must be unopened.

For returns via home pick-up, please contact aesop@mizzen.me or our customer service team via WhatsApp on +971504933768. A team member will arrange for courier pick-up. Please include the original invoice along with original packaging. Products must be unopened. Once received and processed, the refund will be issued to the card used for payment within 2 business days of processing the return However, your bank or card issuer may take 7-10 days

settings.heading: Can I cancel or amend my order?
settings.row_content: Please contact our customer service team on aesop@mizzen.me or via WhatsApp on +971504933768 if you wish to cancel or amend your order. Although we cannot guarantee this, we will happily do our best to amend or cancel any order as long as it has not been already processed.

settings.heading: Digital Gift Cards
settings.row_content: We do not offer digital gift cards at the moment.

settings.heading: Taxes
settings.row_content: All prices on the Aesop United Arab Emirates website are inclusive of 5% VAT. The amount paid will be displayed on the invoice included in your order.

settings.heading: Payment security
settings.row_content:
The security of our customers' personal and credit card information is paramount to Aesop and we continue to invest in the development of robust security systems.

Our website is encrypted with Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificates, which creates a secure transaction area in which to enter your payment information. You can be sure that you have entered a secure area as a small padlock symbol will appear in the address bar of your browser.

We also have secure firewall systems and daily scanning in place, to ensure that any attempted intrusions are swiftly identified, and a biannual penetration security scan conducted by our security partners. We regularly engage with industry experts to seek the most up-to-date security advice, and are constantly seeking to improve upon our rigorous processes.

settings.heading: Payment options
settings.row_content: We accept Visa, Mastercard and American Express.

settings.heading: Cash on delivery
settings.row_content: We do not offer cash on delivery of the moment. Payment shall be made online via Visa, a Mastercard or an American Express card.

settings.heading: Aesop store credit note for online orders
settings.row_content: We cannot accept an Aesop credit note for online orders.

settings.heading: When will my order be shipped?
settings.row_content:
All UAE: Order placed before 4pm will be delivered on the same day in Dubai and next business day for all other Emirates. Orders placed after 4pm will be delivered within 2 days (excluding Fridays and public holidays).

 

Please contact us on aesop@mizzen.me or via WhatsApp on +971504933768 for any further queries about your order.

settings.heading: Do you have any delivery charges?
settings.row_content:
Free delivery for all Orders AED 300 and above.

Shipping fee of AED 25 for all Orders below AED 300.

Please note that the delivery charge of AED 25 will not be refunded in case of any product return or exchange.

settings.heading: Can I collect my order in store?
settings.row_content: We are currently not offering click and collect from the store.

settings.heading: Do you offer international shipping?
settings.row_content:
Orders placed on the Aesop United Arab Emirates website can only be delivered within the United Arab Emirates.

If you wish to have your order shipped to another country, please open the destination menu from the footer section of the website and select the country you wish to ship to.

From here, you will be redirected to the Aesop website that services your chosen region, and can proceed to order your items. Note that prices will be displayed in the destinationâ€™s currency. If you cannot find your preferred destination, regrettably we do not ship to that country at this time.

To purchase Aesop products locally, you can locate your nearest Aesop Signature Store or stockist by using the Aesop online store locator

settings.heading: What should I do if my order is damaged in transit?
settings.row_content: If an item has been damaged in transit, Aesop will provide you with a replacement or a full refund. Please contact us on aesop@mizzen.me or via WhatsApp on +971504933768 with your order details and an accompanying photo of the damaged item.

settings.heading: Where will my order be shipped from?
Signature on delivery
settings.row_content:
A signature may be required for deliveries depending on the delivery partner.

Please contact us if you have any additional requests.

settings.heading: Dangerous Goods
settings.row_content: Some of our products are classified as Class 3 Flammable Liquids for the purposes of transportation. Any parcel that we ship containing these products will be packaged and labelled appropriately to comply with Dangerous Goods safety regulations.

settings.heading: PO Boxes
settings.row_content: We do not accept PO Box addresses for all orders within the United Arab Emirates. We will require a physical mailing address.

settings.text:
“A fine, courteous welcome is an invitation card that remains valid year-round.”

Joseph Joubert
